p: In this investigation, 0.2 g leaves were homogenized in 1.5 mL phosphate buffer (50 mM) containing 2% (w/v) polyvinylpyrrolidone, 0.1% (v/v) Triton-X-100, and 100 mM ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid disodium salt (EDTA-Na 2). The grinding fluid was centrifuged at 13,000× g for 15 min at 4 °C, and the resulting supernatant was retrieved as an enzyme extract.
